Reason: The configuration option REUSE_SPACE in the h2 software project is performance-sensitive because changing its value significantly affects system performance. When the REUSE_SPACE value is increased, it can lead to reduced memory consumption and improved performance by reusing memory space efficiently. Conversely, decreasing the REUSE_SPACE value can result in increased memory consumption and potentially slower execution times due to more frequent memory allocations and deallocations.
